name: Police Horse Crime Chase 2016 – Escaped jailbirds, Alcatraz Prisoners n thoroughbred stallion patrol Racing Adventure
name_original: Police Horse Crime Chase 2016 – Escaped jailbirds, Alcatraz Prisoners n thoroughbred stallion patrol Racing Adventure
description:
With Police horses vs robbers, take the ultimate cop action to capture the escaped prisoners.

High profile prisoner have escaped from Alcatraz jail and are hiding in the city at the foot of the mountain. Your mission is to find them all and return them to the Prison.

Will you be able to find them all within limited time? Play the latest Police Horse Crime Chase 2016 to find out “Are you worthy of the time limit challenge???”
